name: AddForce Arena
description:
The AddForce Arena is a competition involving 2 opponents fighting in an arena, and broadcasted all over the world, despite its violent aspect, because no player really dies in the arena. 
This competition determines the ranking of the best AddForcers in the world. 

HOW TO WIN

To earn points, you will have to collect shards present in the map (max stack: 50)

To claim the score recovered, you will have to drop these shards in the active pillar of the arena, but be careful! If you get neutralized by your opponent, you will lose all of your shards

Be strategic! The more the pillar is filled, the higher the score won

10/50 = 2 pts
20/50 = 3 pts
30/50 = 4 pts
40/50 = 4 pts
50/50 = 4 pts
